about_the_game:
About This Simulator

"Do you wanna be a millionaire?

Everyone has a dream of becoming a millionaire. But it is very hard work.
It would be fantastic for me to make my own money and become a millionaire!

"Stock Stack" is a simple game that simulates stock investment
and it can be used to educate or compete with your friend
Maybe whoever know about investment market more can be a winner
because this game reflects the working principles of the real stock market.
(not at all!)

How to Play

First, when you start, you will set your start money and price, rate of price change,. etc of 6 listed stocks\
then your investment is started!
You can raise by investing your favorite stock, earn money by working hard, and save your money safely in bank! (with a little interest)
That's all, simple. right?

Controls

All controls are just mouse, keyboard, and... your brain!
you need to analyze stock market's flow with it's graph, news, etc,.

"Stock Stack" is a simple game that simulates stock investment

How to Play

First, when you start, you will set your start money and price, rate of price change,. etc of 6 listed stocks\
then your investment is started!
You can raise by investing your favorite stock, earn money by working hard, and save your money safely in bank! (with a little interest)
That's all, simple. right?

Controls

All controls are just mouse, keyboard, and... your brain!

name: Stock Stack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 6.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
